content: Hi Guys! I have recently started exploring Lean and group theory at the same time. Can anyone recommend some resource where I can find some simple example proofs related to Group theory. Any advice would be helpful!

If you scroll up you'll see several other people asking the same question :-)

I ran a workshop on groups and subgroups -- notes are here. https://xenaproject.wordpress.com/2021/01/28/formalising-mathematics-workshop-2/ It might make sense to do workshop 1 first though...
Thanks @Kevin Buzzard I'll go through this thread and thanks for sharing the resource!!
Ayush Agrawal has marked this topic as resolved.
oh noes -- no more questions about group theory from beginners ever :-) This issue is now resolved!
